data.message: Facebook. Is it possible to get help with my account pretty please 🙏

replies.message: Hi Joann. This is a great place to ask questions. Let us know how we can help. -Joe

Hi Joe - thanks for replying.   About a month ago, FB asked me to send in my ID which I did right away.   I've always only had the one account since my first day joining.   Ever since I sent in my ID, I only get the message "we are verifying your ID and will let you know when it's verified" 
Is something wrong with the process?   How long does or can it take to confirm that ID and account are authentic.    This is a little concerning to me since I sent my full Picture ID in to you guys without covering anything.    I'm very worried since I haven't had not one update.    Please advise 🙏

Thanks in advance
Facebook is it possible to reply to me please?
Hi, Joann. We appreciate your patience while our team reviews your ID. -Rhea
Hi Rhea,   Thank you for replying.   It's been a month already,  I'm just wondering how long it could take up to?
Hi, Joann. We do not have an estimated time for how long it takes. -Rhea
Facebook   Hi Rhea, Ok, But in the meantime, my ID is safe and is only being used for verifying my account.   Correct?
Facebook  Can you please reply to my question.
Hi Joann. After you send us a copy of your ID, it'll be stored securely while we resolve your issue. We also delete the copy of your ID after 30 days. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2m0oEEN. -Jessica
